## TokenErc20Module.mintTo() method

Mint Tokens

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
mintTo(to: string, amount: BigNumberish): TransactionResultPromise;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  to | string |  |
|  amount | BigNumberish |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

TransactionResultPromise

## Remarks

Mint tokens to a specified address

## Example


```javascript
// Address of the wallet you want to mint the tokens to
const toAddress = "{{wallet_address}}";

// The amount of this token you want to mint
const amount = ethers.utils.parseEther("1.5");

await module.mintTo(toAddress, amount);
```
